Description: Sun-drenched apartment in East Cambridge on a quiet, charming street. 5-minute walk to new Lechmere MBTA Station at Cambridge Crossing (Green Line). 10-minute walk to Kendall Square (Red Line). 10-minute walk to Charles River. Ample street parking. Acclaimed restaurants and parks steps away. Entire first floor of two-family house (first floor is raised from street level) with private back entrance. Washer and dryer in unit. Gas stove. Vintage and refurbished farmhouse kitchen sink and beautiful claw foot bathtub. Recently renovated bathroom. Huge walk-in closet. Kitchen furniture available. Private patio negotiable. Private storage area in basement negotiable. No pets. Owners are responsive and live in the second-floor apartment. First month's rent, last month's rent, and security deposit required. Owner pays for water. Tenant pays for gas and electricity.
